lines: 1. Gose mambia erioba rikooroka,'Mobas'oseri' omosunte n'ekiriri;Yeso narache n'obonene bwaye,Kwoyia abanto baye.
O! Yeso Kristo ndiriri,Natoak'eriogi?Yes'ochire, haleluya,haleluya naboHaleluya Amen.
2. Gose mobaso gati gose ko bwaira,Gose nebe obotuko bw'ekeigoro,Neb'omobaso korw'obonene bwaye,'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.
3. 'Buya n'omogoko titogokwa rinde,'Borwair' obororo n'ebirero mbio;Kobogorigwa as'obonene bwaye,'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.
4. Emeganda yaye etere Hosana,Amalaika n'abachenu mbabeo;Obuya nabobe as' obosio bwaye,'Kero Yes' Akwoyi' abaye.
